• Step 2 - Identify Contact and Collect Consent

    The goal of this step is customer acquisition. The visitor arrives on the website at an article page that contains a call-to-action form. If the visitor submits the call-to-action form, we are able to do the following:

    • Use the visitor's email address to turn them into a known contact in Sitecore's Experience Database
    • Trigger a Sitecore goal (which can be used for personalization or other purposes in the current and future visits)
    • Attempt to collect consent information for re-marketing opportunities
    • Send a confirmation email
    • Enroll the visitor in a Marketing Automation plan to nurture new contacts

    The visitor will receive an email after submitting the call-to-action form due to implied consent but it is important that we collect consent information from the visitor if we wish to send marketing emails in the future.
